Texto: 
removal of bezoar
upper gi demonstrates a heterogeneous mottled mass within the lumen of the stomach.
bezoar
• bezoar
• ingestion of food recent or immediately prior to upper gi series
• amazingly huge and necrotic neoplasm
80 year old woman with dysphagia for both solid and liquid food
